title: Build up your own Titanium Gravel Bike with the new Thomson Piedmont Frameset
content:
Well over a year since we originally set eyes on it, Thomson have named and made available their titanium gravel frameset; the Piedmont. Named after the Piedmont plateau near the Appalachian Mountains, this titanium frame is built with a geometry that would serve gravel riders in the region well, with tire clearance up to 44c [â€¦]
